Featured Projects

Autonomous UAV

A drone with a collision avoidance algorithm.

Does Mobility Make or Break Friendships?

A study of the effect of Mobility on Friendship using different models to predict how many friends Foursquare users will make or break in a 22 month time period.

Navigation and Path Planning for the Thymio Robot

We used computer vision to detect and track two seperate Thymios, and switch their positions using following an optimal path, all while avoiding local obstacles.
